title: Samsung U.S. Millennials' 6th Favorite Brand
text:
Samsung came sixth on a list of 105 favorite brands among American millennials, being the only Asian company in the top 10.

U.S. magazine Business Insider said that Amazon topped in a survey of 1,000 Amercians aged 19 to 30 compiled by PR company Moosylvania, and four other American companies filled up the top five places -- Apple, Nike, Walmart, and Target.

Samsung is in the same spot as last year. It is followed by Google, Adidas, Coca-Cola, and Microsoft.

With the exception of Samsung and Germany's Adidas, all were American brands. Japan's Sony, which was in eighth place last year, fell to 13th.
